description: This source file defines REST API endpoints for managing 'Client' resources using FastAPI. It includes functions for listing, creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting clients, with ownership and role-based access control. The module utilizes SQLAlchemy ORM for database interactions and references schemas and security utilities from the application's internal modules.

methods.name: list_clients( db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), offset_limit: tuple[int, int] = Depends(pagination_params), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list clients with pagination and role-based filtering.

methods.name: create_client( payload: ClientCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new client, with role-based ownership assignment.

methods.name: get_client( client_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific client by ID with ownership validation.

methods.name: update_client( client_id: int, payload: ClientCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles PUT requests to update a client's information with ownership checks.

methods.name: delete_client( client_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db), current: User = Depends(get_current_user), )
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a client with ownership validation.
